#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

LL f[1005];

int main()
{
	int t,x,y,z;
	t=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(x);
		sc(y);
		sc(z);
		f[1]=x;
		f[2]=y;
		for(int  i=3;i<=z;i++)
		{
			f[i]=f[i-1]+f[i-2];
		}
		pl(f[z]);
	}
	return 0;
}
